elements.title: Frontier Warehousing Launches Open Offer for 26% Stake in Kesoram Industries at ₹5.48 per Share (Scanx – Corporate Actions)
elements.contents:
Top News
Frontier Warehousing Launches Open Offer for 26% Stake in Kesoram Industries at ₹5.48 per Share 4 hours ago
Frontier Warehousing Limited has initiated a mandatory open offer to acquire up to 26% stake in Kesoram Industries at ₹5.48 per share, totaling ₹442.26 crores. This follows Frontier's agreement to purchase a 42.80% stake from Kesoram's promoter group at ₹4 per share. The open offer could significantly alter Kesoram's ownership structure. Kesoram's financial data shows substantial changes over the past year, with total assets decreasing by 75.93% and total equity increasing by 376.27%.

elements.title: Can Fin Homes Engages with Investors and Analysts in Mumbai Meetings (Scanx – Corporate Actions)
elements.contents:
Can Fin Homes Engages with Investors and Analysts in Mumbai Meetings 6 hours ago
Can Fin Homes Limited conducted investor and analyst meetings in Mumbai on December 4, 2025. Led by MD & CEO Suresh S Iyer and CFO Abhishek Mishra, the discussions covered Q2 FY25-26 results, Net Interest Margin, growth prospects, asset quality, and business outlook. The meetings, arranged by DAM Capital, attracted diverse financial professionals from mutual funds, asset management firms, insurance companies, and banks. Sessions were structured throughout the day, including group and individual meetings. No unpublished price-sensitive information was shared, maintaining regulatory compliance.

elements.title: Shining Tools Limited Reports 295% Jump in Half-Year Profit to Rs 183.83 Lakhs (Scanx – Corporate Actions)
elements.contents:
Shining Tools Limited Reports 295% Jump in Half-Year Profit to Rs 183.83 Lakhs 5 hours ago
Shining Tools Limited, a cutting tools manufacturer, reported significant financial growth for the half year ended September 30, 2025. Net profit increased by 295% to Rs 183.83 lakhs, revenue grew by 50% to Rs 800.56 lakhs, and earnings per share rose by 281% to Rs 4.42. The company recently completed its IPO, issuing 15 lakh equity shares at Rs 114 per share, and listed on the BSE SME Platform on November 14, 2025.

elements.contents:
Reliance Industries Prepares for Jio IPO: DRHP in Progress 11 hours ago
Reliance Industries has begun preparing the Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) for the potential initial public offering (IPO) of its telecom subsidiary, Jio. The company is awaiting guidelines from the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) before officially filing the IPO documents. The DRHP is a crucial document providing detailed information about the company to potential investors. Jio's possible IPO is generating interest due to its significant impact on the Indian telecom sector, large subscriber base, and expansion into various digital services.

elements.title: Frontier Warehousing Launches Open Offer for 26% Stake in Kesoram Industries at ₹5.48 per Share (Scanx – Orders & Deals)
elements.contents:
Frontier Warehousing Launches Open Offer for 26% Stake in Kesoram Industries at ₹5.48 per Share 4 hours ago
Frontier Warehousing Limited has initiated a mandatory open offer to acquire up to 26% stake in Kesoram Industries at ₹5.48 per share, totaling ₹442.26 crores. This follows Frontier's agreement to purchase a 42.80% stake from Kesoram's promoter group at ₹4 per share. The open offer could significantly alter Kesoram's ownership structure. Kesoram's financial data shows substantial changes over the past year, with total assets decreasing by 75.93% and total equity increasing by 376.27%.

elements.title: Can Fin Homes Engages with Investors and Analysts in Mumbai Meetings (Scanx – IPO News)
elements.contents:
Can Fin Homes Engages with Investors and Analysts in Mumbai Meetings 6 hours ago
Can Fin Homes Limited conducted investor and analyst meetings in Mumbai on December 4, 2025. Led by MD & CEO Suresh S Iyer and CFO Abhishek Mishra, the discussions covered Q2 FY25-26 results, Net Interest Margin, growth prospects, asset quality, and business outlook. The meetings, arranged by DAM Capital, attracted diverse financial professionals from mutual funds, asset management firms, insurance companies, and banks. Sessions were structured throughout the day, including group and individual meetings. No unpublished price-sensitive information was shared, maintaining regulatory compliance.

Indian stock market closed marginally positive with Nifty 50 at 26,017.10 (+0.12%) and Sensex at 85,145.51 (+0.05%). Market breadth was negative with 2,548 declining stocks versus 1,977 advancing. Buzzing stocks included Adani Enterprises, IndiGo, Mahindra & Mahindra, Lenskart, JSW Steel, and Reliance Industries, each with significant corporate announcements.

elements.title: HCLTech Partners with Strategy And Co to Boost AI-Driven Data Analytics (Scanx – IPO News)
elements.contents:
HCLTech Partners with Strategy And Co to Boost AI-Driven Data Analytics 6 hours ago
HCL Technologies has formed a strategic partnership with Strategy And Co to enhance data analytics capabilities using advanced AI solutions. The collaboration focuses on expanding the use of Strategy Mosaic, an AI-based universal semantic layer, to serve global business clients more effectively. This partnership aims to provide more sophisticated data analytics solutions, potentially offering clients enhanced data insights, improved decision-making capabilities, and a competitive advantage in their markets.
